description:
Don has created the ultimate chocolate to trap Hiroshi in one sided love.  A new wolf from France is joining Japan’s Secret Doberman corps.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chocolate Nousatsu Jiken / Ookami Shoujo Ansatsu Jiken
The Chocolate Enchantment Case / The Wolf Girl Assassination Case
チョコレート悩殺事件 / 狼少女暗殺事件
